website_summaries.verdict: Affordable, easy to assemble, and very rugged, but you shouldn't store anything in it that you wouldn't want to get wet or eaten.
pros: Made from a long-lasting resin styled like wicker
Customer service available for help with tool-free assembly
cons: Reports that some of these show up either missing parts or with the wrong parts
Not water, squirrel, or mouse proof

customer_reviews.title: Mice can get inside if the back is near to a house with wood siding
customer_reviews.text: I am surprised that no one else has commented, but mice love it as a nesting place. The back was against my wood sided house and they would climb the wall and then crawl inside the unit (with lots of nesting material). I now try to keep it away from the house but it keeps getting moved back. I have thwarted them for now with some strips of wood glued into place inside the storage unit but I don't regard wood as permanent barricade for mice.
customer_reviews.author: Greybeard

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Perfect size for pillow storage, but it also serves as an extra seat for my girls (I ordered 2). Also, it was SO easy to put together!
customer_reviews.author: CincoMama10

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these to put inside of my home. I thought it would be a great storage for any items that doesn't really have a place to go or making my home look neater such as shoving dog food and toys in here etc, and being that it has a seat on top is a definite plus. Easy to install with no tools at all, extremely durable when being sat on and just overall a great purchase. Great match with espresso/brown furniture. I do not plan on putting this outside, it's a great different look for inside my home, I'm sure I will buy more in the future for outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: Gena

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Decoration & Hose-Hider!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this little box!!! I bought it for my front flower bed to hide my hose, and I've gotten so many compliments on it from neighbors. It took less than 5min to put together and is very sturdy. I have my hose entering through the back of the box via the space between the lid and back panel. It's exactly what I was looking for!!
customer_reviews.author: GatorDO17

customer_reviews.title: Product came as expected through Prime. Box was damaged ...
customer_reviews.text: Product came as expected through Prime. Box was damaged. After unpacking and putting it halfway together I realized that the wrong parts were included. There is a side that allows you to attach the top of the box that was not included. Instead two sides were the same and the top does not fit or work properly. Update: After speaking to Amazon customer service they have replaced the item with a new one free of charge. I love amazon’s customer service. I will be sure to update my rating after I receive the new product.
customer_reviews.author: Michael D. Fenlon

customer_reviews.title: Allows water inside
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived with NO assembly instructions. I deduced that the pieces just snapped together. The bottom does not snap to anything, the top portion just sits on it. The bottom piece is slightly bigger and does not fit exactly underneath the top thus allowing water in when it rains. So I cannot put anything in there in fear of it getting wet, defeating the whole purpose for ordering it. The size is adequate. But overall I am VERY disappointed with this product and would not recommend it if you plan to have it outside.
customer_reviews.author: Dottie B.

customer_reviews.title: Shipped with two parts C and no part A.
customer_reviews.text: Had two parts C and no part A. Was unable to take back apart for shipping, had to put in a larger box. Cost me $10 to ship back.
customer_reviews.author: Julie R. Oros

customer_reviews.title: If it doesn’t come with directions, return it.
customer_reviews.text: This produce did not come with directions. So I decided to give it a shot and try to put it together. I put all of the sides on and then realized, I needed to put the base in between. But once the sides are clipped in, there is no taking them apart. So I had to throw the entire thing away. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: A. Lazzara

customer_reviews.title: Helps eliminate clutter
customer_reviews.text: This came and is as I expected. It certainly helps keep the patio neater and free of obvious necessary but unpleasant things, think dog brushes and fertilizer. However, it is a hard plastic and in snapping it together one of the hinges broke off leaving the top sort of lopsided. I patched it together using a large bolt that allows the top to open and to outward appearances all is fine. But you have to be careful. Still, I will probably get another one because more stuff is accumulating.
customer_reviews.author: Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Lid designed poorly
customer_reviews.text: I can see the concept is good. But the hinges are designed poorly. The only way to get the top to secure is by brute force. You put one notch into the hinge and have to squeeze and stretch and force the other notch into the other hinge. Inevitably one of the notches broke off because it's just a small hollow plastic notch. Not good quality. So now I have a small gardening box that has a completely loose lid that just sits there. Every time I open it the lid falls off. The only positive thing is that the rest of it clicked together nicely.
customer_reviews.author: L. Biscay

customer_reviews.title: Great for package deliveries
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great. It's small enough to fit on the front porch, but large enough to be usable storage space. For an all-plastic/resin unit, it looks good, has a heavy lid that shuts firmly, and feels nice and solid. We use it on our front porch and put a small (laminated) sign on top asking that package deliveries be put inside. I'd say about 90% of time they do it, which means most of our packages don't sit out in plain view to tempt would-be thieves. It's a great solution. It's very rare for us to get a package that doesn't fit inside.
customer_reviews.author: John Mechalas

customer_reviews.title: Well made but a tad too short
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and seems durable, but not quite right for my purpose. Bought it to store a spare 5-gal. propane tank; a couple of reviews said it was the right size. But the lid (seat) rests on the tank and doesn't close all the way, even with the tank placed off-center to fit between the structural supports on the underside of the lid.
customer_reviews.author: Dr Why

customer_reviews.title: Nice storage product and very easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Suncast makes a great product, very durable, and well constructed. I have purchased other Suncast products in the past and have been very happy with them. My dilemma with this storage container is the dimensions listed in the description. The dimensions listed are the measurements of the container fully assembled, which is great. My problem is I wish the description would have included the measurements of the actual storage capacity. When I measured the room I needed, the assembled numbers meet my requirements but when I put it together, the storage capacity was short. Lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: Roger1918

customer_reviews.title: Don't hesitate! First Rate!*****
customer_reviews.text: I did not purchase this- because I don't have a need -at this time but- I want to. My daughter purchased a couple tho- they are awesome! I could not believe it when she told me where she got them and the cost. She stores her chair pillows inside and the benches provide comfortable extra seating. These benches look and feel expensive- you could easily expect to see a price tag of well over 150.00 anywhere else. - don't hesitate to pick up one or even more - even to store charcoal or grill tools. - X-tra seating to boot. ( I'm not getting paid to write this- I like to write honest reviews - positive or negitive)
customer_reviews.author: Bright spot

customer_reviews.title: USEFUL AND DECORATIVE
customer_reviews.text: We changed our outdoor theme to a Safari. Patio blinds are tan... brown umbrellas... storage containers - all brown. These are SO perfect. We have two of them, both under the gazebo, but when it rains with a little breeze things get wet! I would say these are water tight because we keep 20 beach towels in one of them and they are always dry. The other one is used to store outdoor items when a storm is coming... like little centerpieces, sun lotions, sun glasses, etc. We have purchased several Suncast Resin products and have never been disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Della Halpin

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This cabinet has no screws, bolts or cam-locks. Tongue-and-groove joints hold it together. At first, I thought it would be too flimsy but after I assembled it I found it to be surprisingly strong and stable. You can assemble it in 5 minutes or less. No tools are required, although I found it helped to use a flathead screwdriver to pop the top lid in place. So far, so good. Looks nice on the patio.
customer_reviews.author: GS TX

customer_reviews.title: Lid will not stay closed
customer_reviews.text: We loved this at first, but are so disappointed that the lid will not stay shut. We securely close it, then come back hours later and the lid has opened. I'm not sure what the reasoning for this is, but it is very disappointing. We recycled the box already otherwise we would have returned the item.
customer_reviews.author: katie

customer_reviews.title: Worth the wait!
customer_reviews.text: While it took almost a month to receive this product, it was worth the wait! It seems very sturdy! It is actually bigger than I thought, so will be more than I hoped for, as far as storage. I can sit on it, or use it as a table by my swinging chair. I can't comment on the weather proof yet, as we haven't even had any rain, but it doesn't look like there will be any problems, with the way it is put together. One note: don't be like the hubby! Put the bottom on, BEFORE you get all four sides on. It is very hard to take back apart.
customer_reviews.author: bootaddict

customer_reviews.title: What a great find and bargain!
customer_reviews.text: This arrived in a sturdy box with no dents so there was no damage to mine at all. I love the rich brown color. It goes great with my resin wicker patio sat. The instructions were super simple and it snapped together in about 5 minutes and I am NOT kidding. I had read very helpful previous reviews (prior to purchase) reference getting the hinged lid to snap into place. All I did was sit on it and BAM it was in! I have my bag of charcoal and grilling utensils in mine for now.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not the greatest quality for your money
customer_reviews.text: For the price I guess I expected a little higher quality material. The plastic box snapped together in less than 5 minutes. The lid hinge seems like it could possibly break easily if it is opened quickly, time will tell. I purchased this to hold my pool vacuum and electrical cords on my patio. Unfortunately the box is a little too small for my vacuum but I will find another use for it. If I would have seen this item on a shelf I wouldnt have paid more than $25 for the quality. But oh well, I guess I'll keep it because I'm too lazy to box it up and return.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Received the box ahead of the est time to deliver. The box was easy to put together. Last step was a little difficult to get the lid on the box, but we succeeded. The box is for bocce matches to keep scoreboard, paper, rules, etc inside it. Day after it arrived and we set it out we had a terrific rain storm. Box was dry. Water was on top of the seat, but nothing leaked into the box. We were afraid that the lid would fly up with wind, but nah that didn't happen. Very pleased with the box.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High Quality at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. Fast shipping and, a very sturdy product. I weight about 216 and the seat holds my weight just fine. I needed something to store my car cover on the porch when I was not using it. I was able to store my car cover with room to spare. I put my sprinkler in there as well. Suncast finaly did something right. They usually sacrifice on quality to get to a lower price point. This is quality as a reasonable price point. I give Suncast an A+.
customer_reviews.author: David W

customer_reviews.title: Good value, keeps  seat cushions dry
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking, small storage seat. Accommodates 4 seat cushions. This storage seat is super easy to assemble. Update: we have had it for over a year now and it stays on our semi-covered porch. It’s still in an excellent condition and we didn’t notice any fading, nor any water coming in. I would buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: Bluevanilladonkey

customer_reviews.title: Great storage unit
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to keep my gardening and patio stuff in. It was very easy to assemble and the lid secures well keeping the rain and moisture out. This also works as an extra seat which is nice when having people over. I love this item and may even buy a second one.
customer_reviews.author: Penny Lane

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to outdoor living space
customer_reviews.text: Bought one of these last year for additional storage/seating around my fire pit. I was skeptical at first because there were no assembly screws, but it came together nicely. It has a great look, especially if you are pairing with wicker furniture. The unit is sturdy, holding 250+ lbs with no problem. I bought another recently for additional space, and will probably by another for a different outdoor seating area in my yard. I do wish: 1) the unit had shelving or compartments, and b) the lid was more secure (read: spider proof). Still, highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: This was an awesome purchase. I will buy more. I am more than pleased and will consider other products from this brand. I have had mine on the front porch for months. It has its color and I do wipe it down from time to time. It serves it's purpose and looks good. It was not hard at all for me to assemble. So if you need a small storage box that also functions as a seat I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Product Review Pro

customer_reviews.title: A wonderful item that can be used in a small space
customer_reviews.text: This item is designed for being a storage seat but I am using it in my sunroom as a stand for my television as it has the lifted up sides for security and will fit in the corner neatly. It also has the storage capacity for extra blankets or cushions when not being used and it matches the other resin wicker look furniture I purchased. In addition, you do not need a tool to put together. The pieces snap into place as they indicate in the instructions. Took about five minutes to put together. Easy!
customer_reviews.author: Mary A. Cade

customer_reviews.title: I love these!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! I have one on the front stoop for packages, and one on the deck for cushions and gardening stuff. We've had several heavy rains, and everything inside stayed perfectly dry. They were very simple to put together, I don't understand why some others have had trouble. A flat bladed screwdriver provides the perfect amount of leverage to get the second hinge together without damaging the box, and assembly took about three minutes each. Highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: WolfSinger

customer_reviews.title: Strong and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I just put this together and I'm very impressed with the durability although remains to be seen how long it will last but I don't foresee that being an issue. The instructions for assembly were very easy to follow. I was so happy when I dumped out the pieces not to see any screws or whatever. It's just connecting the sides, top and bottom. The top was a bit more challenging because there are hinges and you have to fit just so, I broke not one but two nails doing this but mission accomplished. It compliments my patio well.
customer_reviews.author: eame

customer_reviews.title: or the product is not as good as the reviews made it seem
customer_reviews.text: Either I didn't receive all the right parts, or the product is not as good as the reviews made it seem. Not waterproof, not sturdy (except when you try to take apart the 4 sides to return it, it is impossible and you have to break the product to do so), the bottom was just a tray you put the 4 corners on, and it is not seal tight, so water will get in.... I should have known, with it being a Suncast. Horrible and cheap products always.
customer_reviews.author: mmj

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: This is prefect for what I needed it for and it's so east to put together a monkey can do it. I put this together in minutes and yet it's so sturdy I can stand on it. In all with the price I paid I was very happy girl. Hope this helps!
customer_reviews.author: freddy

customer_reviews.title: this thing is just awesome. super ez to assemble
customer_reviews.text: this thing is just awesome. super ez to assemble, well made and seems like it will last. I use mine to store charcoal bags and grilling accessories, I have a covered patio but the Suncast storage seat does get exposed to the sun and it sits in heat in excess of 100 degrees F since I live in AZ. These thing just takes it without complaining, but I can't say weather water wont seep thru it in the rain. All and all this was a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MadridMig

customer_reviews.title: storage container itself is well built but the inside dimensions ...
customer_reviews.text: storage container itself is well built but the inside dimensions should be changed because i only purchased because of them. they may be the actual dimensions but not the usable ones due to the structural bracing inside which take s away a very large amount of usable space. really felt i was misled by the quoted figures.
customer_reviews.author: Edward P Lariviere

customer_reviews.title: Three Months and Going Strong
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been keeping an open bag of bird seed in this deck box, and it hasn’t gotten the slightest bit damp or moldy in the two months it’s been inside it. The seal has been tight and has kept animals out as well. I wouldn’t hesitate to store cushions inside it. I’m really impressed with it, and it’s sturdy enough to sit on.
customer_reviews.author: Freemajo

customer_reviews.title: Great product so far.
customer_reviews.text: This product was very easy to put together. Pretty much looks rodent proof. No tools needed. Bought it for two reasons. One to store two small cushions in. Perfect for that. The next has no impact on the product but I also bought it so Amazon would stop throwing my small packages over my fence. So far so good. But amazon has a good scam going. Give lousy delivery service so their customers will spend $40 for a delivery box. Wish I could give Amazon a 1 star rating.
customer_reviews.author: chucky333

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to put together
customer_reviews.text: Disappointing, none of the pieces went together...I even had a friend try to put together and even he couldn’t do it! Since I’ve been out of town , the return date has passed, so I will donate it in hopes someone else can figure it out!
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Drummond

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Container!
customer_reviews.text: This little storage container/seat is excellent. I bought it to store a couple of chair cushions so they would be protected from rain, etc. when not in use. It's not a big container, but the two cushions fit nicely with room to spare. It is perfect for my use and very sturdy. I highly recommend this container. It took only 5 minutes to snap together without even glancing at the instructions. If I need another one, this is what I'll be buying.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Ann

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and works just as expected
customer_reviews.text: I needed a nice looking box to keep my golf cart battery charger in so I wouldn't have to keep carrying it back and forth from my shed. It also had to keep water out, but I drilled 4 holes in the bottom "just in case." Didn't need to. This was exactly what I needed and works perfectly. The top "clicks" closed and makes for a shelf which is a nice feature. I put it together (no tools required) in less than 5 minutes. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Bobby

customer_reviews.title: Best pool side seat/storage ever!
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these last year It not only still looks brand new but has turned out to be the Best Buy ever! So I just got another one to keep clean towels on the deck. Lightweight, Easy to move around even for the kids. Literally 3-5 minutes to assemble w/o tools...I’m 67 yr old woman and I couldn’t believe How easy this was. Fits together like legos!!!! It looks great and holds my 250 lb self comfortably for sitting! Best Buy ever!
customer_reviews.author: Kathi

customer_reviews.title: Great size
customer_reviews.text: I have a larger one for when my kids were younger for there pool toys I decided to find a smaller one now instead of keeping large one- large one I have over 10 years I power wash it every year still on great shape just wanted smaller one for my dog toys . Very easy to assemble love it looks great on my deck . Perfect for what I need it for
customer_reviews.author: Kimmie

customer_reviews.title: Pretty sturdy piece of furniture
customer_reviews.text: Pretty sturdy piece of furniture. I was surprised to see how solid it was after assembly. I use mine on the front porch so the delivery guys have a place to hide packages and keep them out of sight (we've had some problems with package thefts in my neighborhood). So while I never expected to do much sitting on this thing, I am quite pleasantly surprised at how much weight this seat will take. I'm about 170 pounds and I can stand and jump on it without any problems. I've had a couple of rainstorms and the interior stays bone dry.
customer_reviews.author: Skeletor

customer_reviews.title: Works great, sturdy little outdoor storage bench
customer_reviews.text: Works great, sturdy little outdoor storage bench. I live in Arizona, and this has held up well to the intense sun and heat in the summer. Although it might be a big sun faded, which is to be expected, the plastic isn't brittle or cracking like some cheaply made plastic storage benches can be. It has held up well to the elements, and is a nice small size to store a few outdoor items.
customer_reviews.author: BRoti

customer_reviews.title: This is a fine item. But read the directions
customer_reviews.text: This is a fine item. But read the directions. It seemed so easy to construct I just started doing it and did it wrong. We could not pull it apart to start over. So learn my my mistake! The good news is that the problem was I could not attach the bottom. I just set the bottom on the deck and placed the rest over top of it and it's a reasonable workaround since I'm not moving the box around. If I do need to move it, it's just a bit of extra work. The directions are perfectly clear.
customer_reviews.author: Anni~

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the Deck
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased several of these and continue to be pleased with the quality and usefulness of these products. This particular size is perfect for a deck; big enough to hold garden tools, garden shoes, bug spray and miscellaneous supplies. I bought a second one to keep half-open bags of potting soil and plant nutrients in. Oh, and you can sit on them too. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: 3Acres

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This item is so perfect and so worth buying if you need a little extra outdoor storage. My only advice would be to take your time building this and make sure you put it all together correctly. I personally forgot to add the bottom piece until it was almost too late and it resulted in me having to bend the piece in a certain way to get it to, for lack of better words, squish into place. I love this item!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Moukalled

customer_reviews.title: no assemble instructions
customer_reviews.text: I like the box and it's waterproof. The reason for 3 stars, there was no instructions for assemble. On the box, it said, instructions on the back and I could not find the assemble instructions. Without my 55 years in construction and engineering background, I would not been able to assemble it. I had to layout all the parts and studied them before assembling. Some of the customers would not have been able to assemble this unit without instruction. This is a poor quality check on the packing department. The Company first concern is the customer and top quality control. Will
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Suncast has good customer service .... missing a part
customer_reviews.text: I think I'll probably give it 5 stars once I get the right pieces. Arrived with two of the same pieces which meant the cute unit would snap together as advertised. Call Suncast customer service, they are shipping out the missing piece to me, no questions asked other than "are you totally frustrated right now?" No, I said, just frustrated. Once I have the storage box put together with the right parts, I'll re-rate. Right now, Suncast gets 5-stars for good customer service.
customer_reviews.author: TXgirl

customer_reviews.title: Love the dual purpose
customer_reviews.text: i used to have one large deck box for storage until an 85ft Ash tree landed on my deck! I bought these for the (new) deck. I like the dual purpose aspect of these storage boxes. I use one for bbq items, one to store seat covers, and one for small gardening tools for when I tend to my flower pots on the deck. The fact they can be used as seats helps out during large gatherings. Good product
customer_reviews.author: latinlaw

customer_reviews.title: Right size, look and price.
customer_reviews.text: I needed deck storage for all of my husband's outdoor cooking tools. He uses a flat top grill and a pellet smoker and has certain utensils and tray and bowls that he uses for each. This storage cube was just the right size, water tight and matches our outdoor wicker furniture. And the price was right. Everything we needed to keep his clean tools handy.
customer_reviews.author: karen

customer_reviews.title: This baby locks together like a Lego
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for something bulletproof and that looks reasonably handsome, this is your product. As obvious as this may sound: please read the assembly instructions. This baby locks together like a Lego, but getting the pieces back apart requires inhuman levels of strength (and a hairdryer to heat up the plastic). I made the mistake of getting cocky, tossing the directions, and slapping it all together minus the bottom piece (which should really be added before snapping all of the sides together). I've rage-thrown, kicked, stomped on, and pried at this thing and it doesn't so much as scuff. I would be willing to brave Niagara falls in this baby.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome patio accessory.
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful because its an extra seat for the front patio, can store small items (such as several tabletop citronella torches, citronella fuel, paper towels, and an extension cord), has a neat appearance, made out of thick resin, weatherproof, and as an added bonus our mailman and UPS guy know to throw any packages that are too big for the mailbox in there on rainy days to keep them dry. Not too big to be intrusive, but small enough to be super useful.
customer_reviews.author: Your Name Here

customer_reviews.title: Great deck box for just about anything!
customer_reviews.text: I use this to store my pool towels in on my patio. It is the perfect size and can hold a lot of beach towels. I would love to get another one because they are the perfect size for just about anything. I added a cushion to the top so it can double as a seat but you don't need to have the cushion for it to be comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon M.

customer_reviews.title: Met my Expectations
customer_reviews.text: I had it assembled in 15 minutes. It holds my car cover and looks nice enough to sit by the driveway. I was thinking of getting another one for shoes.
customer_reviews.author: ramonajeffery

customer_reviews.title: Awesome storage bin & easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This storage bin is exactly what I needed. The size is perfect, the quality (and sturdiness) is awesome and it was easy to assemble - very clear instructions with parts labeled (and no tools needed.) It took me less than two minutes to assemble. I use it to store my medium sized, heavy duty patio furniture cover and garden hose. The seat is cool too.
customer_reviews.author: h-bomb

customer_reviews.title: Durability & Keep contents dry.
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect & just what I was hoping for to safely store decor items we have on our deck from rain & storms. We just had that huge storm with 70 mile an hour winds & rain. Everything inside was perfectly dry. We also appreciate we can use the top when grilling out for plates, seasonings, etc. Will also be nice to bring inside during winter months while keeping everything inside. Would definitely order again.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love these storage benches
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these storage benches. They are super deep and holds a ton of pool toys and up to at least three standard seat cushions (four if not so plush). They are super easy to assemble with no tools required. Please pay attention to the parts because once assembled, it's extremely difficult to take apart others are saying. They are also waterproof. It rained the other day for a long time and everything was still dry on the inside. Now when it fell in the pool, that was a different story. Water did get inside. Very sturdy and looks good in my backyard.
customer_reviews.author: Neo

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: We use them as trash bins at our community. They work great and very durable. over 700+ bought. only one has crapped out on us
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not squirrel proof!
customer_reviews.text: We have owned this for three years. It is nice looking and a good size for a small deck. It keeps the items inside dry. My husband stores the seed for the bird feeder inside. Last year a Douglas squirrel figured out there was food in there and chewed a hole in the side of the box. Needless to say he was a happy camper but my husband was not when he had to clean up the mess (droppings included!). Over time the top will warp some and the plastic becomes brittle and cracks.
customer_reviews.author: MS

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the Porch
customer_reviews.text: This is just perfect for our front porch -- easily assembled (even by a klutz like me), good storage capacity, attractive, and sturdy enough to be used as an extra seat when needed. With all the rain we've been having, we've found it to be absolutely weatherproof. At this price, it's absolutely perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Morel-Ensminer

customer_reviews.title: Not cute, but functional
customer_reviews.text: So, at first I was happy with how easy it was to snap the pieces of this product together, and then I tried to put the hinged top on... not so easy! I did not give up and although I broke out into a sweat EVENTUALLY I was able to get the top to snap on. DIFFICULT!!! This is plastic... it looks cheap... it's not very attractive, but I bought it to store my patio furniture covers, and a couple of other odds and ends. It does what it's supposed to do. We'll see how it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Cinnamon9

customer_reviews.title: Great Storage
customer_reviews.text: This was really easy to snap together. It was exactly what I was looking for. Water and weather proof so I can store pillows and make everything look neat and tidy. Keeps things dust and dirt free so I also store outside lights. It is not too big for my patio and I can use it as a table or seat.
customer_reviews.author: W

customer_reviews.title: Great for grill/deck storage
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband to store his grilling utensils in. We have a smoker, a blackstone grill and a regular charcoal grill so he has different utensils for each grill and item that he cooks. I'll be purchasing another to keep near the paddock for horse items that we use daily.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy M.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful looking product for not being real wood
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful looking product for not being real wood. I've only had it a week but it seems sturdy for my purposes. I purchased it to house a transformer we have that controls our front lights. It sits next to our paved steps and blends in well with our front patio. Assembling was a snap, literally. No tools or hardware needed. Everything just snapped into place. If I had read the directions better it would've been put together in two minutes. But being a man I just did a quick glance and it took about seven.
customer_reviews.author: tristan espiritu

customer_reviews.title: Great Design, Easy to Assemble and Keeps Contents Dry
customer_reviews.text: This storage box snaps together easily if you follow directions and keep the contents dry. We have used ours for a month now and it’s done a good job keeping content dry through rain and snow storms. I like that the lid clicks closed to keep animals out and the wind from blowing it open. Well thought out design.
customer_reviews.author: FRANK H DRIES III

customer_reviews.title: Great little storage unit!
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this for about a month, but it's great! I have it outside near my firepit. I keep matches, fire starters, newspapers, etc. in there so everything is nearby when I want to start a fire. It keeps the rain out as well as small animals who live in the woods nearby. It is sturdy enough for an adult to sit on. It was easy to put together and arrived quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. E

customer_reviews.title: Once it's actually constructed it's amazing. I use it for garden patio storage
customer_reviews.text: Once it's actually constructed it's amazing. I use it for garden patio storage, and have been able to use it for seating without a cushion (approximately 115lbs). Putting it together was a nightmare though...I was convinced that either my s/o or me were going to get a finger jammed or pinched.
customer_reviews.author: K.

customer_reviews.title: it seems quite sturdy and seals well
customer_reviews.text: I just ordered this to store my outdoor pillows. After spending several hours putting together all of the other deck furniture it was a pleasure to assemble this! No tools needed and it was done in less than 5 minutes. Surprisingly, it seems quite sturdy and seals well. I am impressed by both the look and function of this product so far. Having not had it long enough to comment on how it holds up outside, I gave it 4 stars for now. Definitely worth buying!
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Not as easy as many have said
customer_reviews.text: It took me and my husband about an hour with it continually falling apart. Finally got it put together by going at it backwards. When we were finished the bottom wouldn't stay on so I held it together and carried it outside. Yes, it looks nice and it holds the hose nicely but it won't stay together if I try to move it and we are too old to get down on the floor and try it again. Besides, I wouldn't risk breaking a nib off the lid, which I did manage to force on without breaking anything.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Romane

customer_reviews.title: Don't be put off by the video.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice looking and sturdy product. But, unless you want to be confused or want a good laugh, do not watch the above video. It is 6 minutes of how to butcher a 2 minute job. Follow the instructions (in 3 languages). Back, bottom, front, a side, the other side, then the top. The only difficult part is bending the tab to fit second hinge, This would only be a problem if you have weak hands, otherwise would be OK. Plus the video shows the bottom up-side-down. Have the finished side up, and the ribbed side down, as shown in the instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Murphy1

customer_reviews.title: So easy to assemble, and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This was a surprisingly great find for me. It snapped together in less than 5min with NO tools needed. It easily supports up to at least 200lbs when sat on. It stores everything I need for taking care of my porch plants with ease. It also looks nice. I believe it’s made primarily for storing cushions, but if it had a little shelf inside or some other way to organ it a bit it would be 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Shawnee

customer_reviews.title: Small and spacious
customer_reviews.text: I placed it on the deck outside which gets some water when it rains. It has stayed dry but it has only rained once since. Also, I bought with the intention to place all the balls and bats my little ones leave out on the backyard and I was concerned when I received it. It fit about 2 basketballs, several baseballs, 2 footballs, kite, baseball gloves and soccer ball and there is still a lot of space.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica F.

customer_reviews.title: Love, love these...
customer_reviews.text: Great price... I've bought 4 and use them in my pool area for various things and just love the fact that I can also sit on it. I put these together myself (73) and have no problems. My cats also love sitting on them looking out into the yard.
customer_reviews.author: Lois

customer_reviews.title: Great for storing garden equipment
customer_reviews.text: I use this to store my small shovels and gardening gloves, along with other gardening tools I keep on hand. I was able to assemble it without too many problems, pretty straightforward to put together. It can be used as extra seating, but I would use a cushion.
customer_reviews.author: L. Stein

customer_reviews.title: Great storage. Assembly a potential hazard.
customer_reviews.text: This does what it needs to do, serves the purpose of storage very well and looks nice on my porch. However, BE CAREFUL WHEN ASSEMBLING THIS. My fingertip got smashed when I was trying to "bend the left hinge" in as the instructions said. It pinched my fingertip and I was afraid I'd need to go to the ER. Painful experience. So yes, this is well worth the price, but watch out with the assembly. Instructions were confusing, as well.
customer_reviews.author: Carla Martin-Wood

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Needed something moderately sized to hold a few gardening supplies. This was perfect. It arrived quickly, was easy to assemble and looks good for plastic. Also you can put a cushion on it and use it as a comfy backup seat. Holds my 165 lb butt without issue. Might order another for the front for package deliveries.
customer_reviews.author: E. Teb

customer_reviews.title: Suncast Storage Seat -- would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: Besides being handy for storing gardening items, the seat is sturdy, attractive and sits underneath a window near the front row of my apartment. I appreciated being able to sit on it as I potted plants for my outside arrangement. It was relatively easy to put together, too. I'm glad I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Shirleyanne43

customer_reviews.title: Not to hard to put together; very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This just arrived and I put it together, with a bit of help from my hubby at the end for extra pressure. It snaps together, and if you follow the directions, it's pretty easy. I stupidly left a bit of my finger under the seam at one point and got a nasty blood blister, but that was my fault. Just be careful. It looks very sturdy and we plan to buy some more.
customer_reviews.author: Pat in Seattle

customer_reviews.title: it's all plastic it looks like MOCHA Resin Wicker
customer_reviews.text: it's all plastic it looks like MOCHA Resin Wicker, but it looks nice for what I wanted it for, keep my BBQ supplies and a few other things in it on my deck. and it makes a extra seat if your in need of one. I'm almost 240 and it holds me ok. but I carful how I set on it, I wouldn't jump on it by any reason. or stand on it. it just snaps together.
customer_reviews.author: Rick S.

customer_reviews.title: Read the instructions before starting!
customer_reviews.text: The product was complete except for the instructions, so I said to myself, how hard can it be, so I put it together leaving the bottom for last. I can see I will need to do some damage to get it apart, so I may just make a plywood bottom that will drop in from the top. Too bad!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Putting together is a pain for me but not for my husband!
customer_reviews.text: It is hard for me to give this thing a review because putting it together is a pain in the butt! I usually don't have problems getting things together but this one has floored me. It ends up that my husband put it together in five minutes and it works great! I am giving it a 4 because I could not get it together. Otherwise it would be a 5.
customer_reviews.author: debra sharp

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, needs instructions
customer_reviews.text: This item just snaps together and appears to be quite sturdy once assembled. I would have given it 5 stars, but the lack of instructions made assembly a bit more difficult than it could have been. Clearly, the components need to be snapped together in a specific sequence ... what that sequence is is not so clear. It holds 2 bags (at 40 lbs each) of pellets for my grill ... that was what I was looking for and it seems to serve this purpose well.
customer_reviews.author: AZPatrick

customer_reviews.title: Quality!
customer_reviews.text: I have gotten so many complements and "where did you get that!?" This little deck box is quality made and the perfect size to hold my chair covers and throw pillow, I also keep my small gardening tools in here. It has not leaked and looks really nice on my patio. The lid opens and closes with no trouble and has no smell inside.
customer_reviews.author: P Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Package does not come with instructions. Just web address ...
customer_reviews.text: Package does not come with instructions. Just web address I didn't see until sides all together. Have to fit in bottom before completing sides. Impossible to get apart to insert bottom so box just sits on bottom, not attached. Go to web site before putting together.
customer_reviews.author: Susan R. Wicks-simmons

customer_reviews.title: Good option to hide delivered packages
customer_reviews.text: So many packages are now getting stolen in my area that I decided to put this on my porch. Hides the packages and my UPS driver figured out pretty quickly this was where he should put packages. Holds about 4 small-medium boxes in it, and plenty of envelope style packages. I'm quite pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Jeaninec

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together!
customer_reviews.text: For the space on our deck, worked out perfect. Holds all the patio furniture covers. Add On: Really like that we can use this for a little end table (Think wine glass!) and it also functions as an extra chair for teens. Might buy one for front patio....
customer_reviews.author: Tootsie

customer_reviews.title: Weatherproof and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly easy to put together. No tools necessary. The box showed a screwdriver but you didn’t actually need one. It’s been outside in multiple storms and has remained completely dry inside. Very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Holly P.

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Overall works great for our deck. Use it to rest things on while grilling and have a place to sit. Only qualm... this is advertised as 22 gallon storage. I assumed a 20-gallon propane tank would fit inside this and it does not. But besides that, meets all of our needs.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Super sturdy. I was being silly and tried to assemble it...did it wrong and forgot the bottom before doing the sides so husband had to take it apart... man it's well made! Its perfect for what I needed which is gardening stuff for my orchids. Also love that it's made in the usa!
customer_reviews.author: IGEMZ

customer_reviews.title: I hate acronyms.
customer_reviews.text: I almost did not buy this due to the reviews on how hard it was to put together.........I hate acronyms..........OMG.........How easy is it to put together. To those who can not read, it really must have been hard for you!!! For anyone who can deduct reasoning from pictures, so easy, and for those that can read, once again, so easy...snap 1....snap 2....snap 3...snap 4...and finally snap 5. I just ordered another one of these!!! Thank you Suncast for a great product and lots of storage room folks!!!
customer_reviews.author: Joe S.

customer_reviews.title: Shipping this product without instructions is ridiculous!
customer_reviews.text: I'm only giving this a low rating for one reason, it came with a zero instructions! If you don't know which order to snap the pieces together, then you have to try to unsnap them and start all over which is virtually impossible! Come on people how hard is it to put an instruction sheet in with your product!
customer_reviews.author: browsable

customer_reviews.title: Really sturdy and durable.  Great shoe box
customer_reviews.text: I'm currently using this as a shoe box so my toddlers can eat my shoes and it effectively keeps my 1 year old out but my 2.5 year old has easy access. I can sit on it with worrying that it'll collapse. I could probably jump on it. It's light enough that my 2.5 can move it around on tile, but it was a bit difficult for me to put together and I build a lot of stuff. However I was very sleep deprived at the time so that may be an unfair assessment.
customer_reviews.author: Savvy Mama

customer_reviews.title: Fits 3 stuffed cushions! Sturdier than expected!
customer_reviews.text: Wow - went together without any tools! Wasn't expecting that, but appreciated it. Very sturdy -- more so than expected. Also pleased with the dark color. It matches my fake-wicker nicely. I bought it to store the cushions, and I thought that other review-readers might appreciate knowing that it can fit 3 Sunbrella brand cushions: 2 chair cushions and a loveseat cushion. (Stuffed/plush kind, not just the flat foam kind.) I did fold the loveseat cushion in half.
customer_reviews.author: srs1981

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than I thought
customer_reviews.text: Needed it to fit my buckets and there was even more space to put other garden tools.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra

customer_reviews.title: We love Suncast
customer_reviews.text: Suncast makes great sturdy products and this one did not disappoint. We bought it to store the covers to our patio furniture and use it for a side table as well. It's just the right size and we love the quality.
customer_reviews.author: PB

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to assemble - durable
customer_reviews.text: We got this to hold our daughters outdoor toys and protect them from our dogs chewing on them... so far so good. Took 4 minutes to assemble and so far the dogs are unable to get at anything.. so far so good! Easy for our young daughters to open and close as well.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome one-seater!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome seat with storage underneath. Bought it for a friend for Christmas and he loved it on his deck. Put it together in about five minutes. It has been on the deck during New Jersey's cold snap, including snow, rain and ice! Its perfect. Amazon's price was unbelievable too! I then purchased Suncast's matching trash hideaway, also great and the two seater Suncast bench in taupe, which matches beautifully and made a nice little seating area on the deck and will withstand the elements. So our friend got a durable seating area on his deck, with a trash hideaway, all for under $200! Thanks Amazon and Suncast!!
customer_reviews.author: Irene

customer_reviews.title: Great outdoor storage bin and a seat!
customer_reviews.text: Came in pieces, well packaged. Very good price compared to a lot of other outdoor storage bins I’ve seen. Pretty easy to assemble, may be a tad confusing at the end but overall simple enough. Pretty strong plastic, able to hold me (145lb male) without any problems. Pretty sizable storage, as described. For now I use it to keep a lot of my pesticides and yard tools! Appears to be weatherproof but I haven’t had it outside long enough to be sure.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Epps

customer_reviews.title: No instructions!!
customer_reviews.text: Great looking product at a good price. HOWEVER NO instructions and when I tried on my own i am left w bottom piece i cannot attach. I dont want to even TRY to unsnap and start over?? What to do????
customer_reviews.author: anne brolley

customer_reviews.title: Just What I Wanted
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these 22 gallon storage seats and the large bench. They are superb - just exactly what I hoped for. Right sized, sturdy, easy to keep clean, and weather durable. I store garden and pool supplies and use them as seating for guests on the patio. I love 'em and recommend them to anyony.
customer_reviews.author: Grumpy Geezer

customer_reviews.title: This was exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I was looking for. I am using it to store all my chemicals and net our Jacuzzi! It's got plenty of room for more supplies if I need it. We've had considerable rain and snow and it's staying dry inside. We like the built in seat too! I'm 250 pounds and it holds my weight with no problems or creaking. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Nofundunn

product_meta.title: Suncast 22-Gallon Small Deck Box - Lightweight Resin Indoor/Outdoor Storage Container and Seat for Patio Cushions, Gardening Tools and Toys - Store Items on Patio, Garage, Yard - Mocha Wicker
product_meta.description: Style:Storage SeatThe Suncast plastic storage container is an attractive and highly versatile solution for use throughout your home and yard. The chest design and hinged lid allow for easy access to your tools and accessories. With a holding capacity of 22 gallons (17.5" x 22.5" x 22.5"), the deck box is compact and space-efficient, easily tucked away in your laundry room or garage. Use it on your deck to stow away patio cushions, gardening tools and grill accessories, or in your house to store boots, gloves, hats, and more. The weatherproof body will resist fading, while the rain water flows off of the box without pooling to keep your belongings dry and mildew-free. Constructed with durable and waterproof resin that is built to last a lifetime.
feature_bullets: DECK STORAGE BOX: Beautiful plastic outdoor box has a 22-gallon capacity for patio, deck, yard, porch, garage, and shed storage!
DURABLE: Water-resistant poly resin construction resists fading and rust to keep your box looking new for years to come
VERSATILE: For use indoors or outdoors to store pool toys, grill supplies, patio cushions, gardening tools, sports equipment, yard gloves, and more!
FUNCTIONAL DESIGN: Lid flips open on hinges for easy access to your items. Rain water flows off of the box to keep your belongings dry and free from mildew and rust
SMALL SIZED: Storage box measures 15"L x 15"W x 20"H, the perfect size for your outdoor space

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars3,729 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
